DOC.criteria: age > 30 year ; abdominal adiposity ( waist circumference : men > 102 cm , woman > 88 cm ) dyslipidemia triglyceride > 400 mg/dL ; serum creatinine > 2 mg/dL ; disturb liver function ; pregnant lactating woman ; presence active cancer , receive receive chemotherapy last three year ; participation another trial ; participant treat Coumadin ( warfarin )
